docs.text: Thank you so much for purchasing this script. We'd be glad to help you if you have any questions relating to this script. No guarantees, but We'll do our best to assist. Item support includes: Availability of the author to answer questions Answering technical questions about item’s features Assistance with reported bugs and issues Help with included 3rd party assets However, item support does not include: Customization services Installation services You can create a ticket for your support and customizations requests. https://support.nicheoffice.web.tr Please do not forget these when creating a ticket Add as much detail as possible (site URL, PHP error logs, etc). You don't need to add your purchase code. When adding video or image please use built-in media uploading system. You can send your FTP or control panel password then we can take fast action. Do not forget to change it when issue solved. Because of timezone differences you can get a reply at different times. Our response time may up to several business days. If you don't see you purchased item on the list go to the account settings page and click to Update Purchases button. Please do not do these things when creating a ticket Giving a low rating or posting spam comments on Codecanyon. Please don't send comments/ratings like "Please reply my ticket". All tickets will be replied, don't worry. In weekends replies can be delayed. After creating a ticket you should not send unnecessary messages like "Hello", "Are you there", "I'm waiting". Because we order tickets from an old one to a new one by using the latest reply time. If you send unnecessary messages your ticket will go to the end of the list and you will receive a late response. Finally We are waiting for your positive feedbacks. Rate us . This documentation created for the first time on 30/12/2017 and updated on 12/08/2021.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Availability of the author to answer questions Answering technical questions about item’s features Assistance with reported bugs and issues Help with included 3rd party assets

In weekends replies can be delayed. After creating a ticket you should not send unnecessary messages like "Hello", "Are you there", "I'm waiting". Because we order tickets from an old one to a new one by using the latest reply time. If you send unnecessary messages your ticket will go to the end of the list and you will receive a late response.
docs.title: Please do not do these things when creating a ticket

docs.text: We are waiting for your positive feedbacks. Rate us . This documentation created for the first time on 30/12/2017 and updated on 12/08/2021.
docs.title: Finally

docs.text: Open License tab on the plugin settings page. Enter your name, email, and purchase code and save settings. Registration code will be generated, copy it. Open https://aiovideodl.ml/activate Paste your registration code. Get and copy your activation code. Paste activation code to Activation code field. Save changes. After activation go to downloaders settings and choose which downloaders you want to enable and save settings.
docs.title: Activate License

docs.text: Open Appearance->Customize Select Site Identity Choose your logo and click to Publish .
docs.title: Adding logo

docs.text: You need to add Facebook and Instagram cookies on plugin settings -> api keys page. Others are not necessary but you can add if you want.
docs.title: Add API Keys

docs.text: Open MySQL® Database Wizard Enter a database name and click to Next Step Set username and password then click to Create User You can use Password Generator for creating strong passwords. But be sure the password does not contain any special characters, choose only numbers. Copy the password to clipboard. Add user to the database. Check All Privileges option then click to Make Changes You will see a confirmation alert after database and user created successfully.
docs.title: Create Database

docs.text: Create a new page on dashboard Enable custom fields Create a new custom field (you can use enter new ) with name show_download_form Set the value of it 1 . You can set value back to 0 if you want to hide the download form. Save and publish the page.
docs.title: Create a downloader page

docs.text: Enabling Plugins Open your Wordpress admin dashboard. Click to Plugins at left navbar and open the plugin manager. Enable Polylang plugin first (If setup page opened choose which languages do you want to use on your website.). Enable All in One Video Downloader plugin.
docs.title: Enable plugins

docs.text: Open your Wordpress admin dashboard. Click to Plugins at left navbar and open the plugin manager. Enable Polylang plugin first (If setup page opened choose which languages do you want to use on your website.). Enable All in One Video Downloader plugin.
docs.title: Enabling Plugins

docs.text: Open Apperance -> Themes Click to Add New Click to Upload Theme Choose theme.zip (you can find it inside the ZIP which you downloaded from CodeCanyon) and upload Activate the theme
docs.title: Install Theme

docs.text: You can add homepage content on Plugin Settings > Appearance tab
docs.title: Adding homepage content

docs.text: Open WordPress plugins page Click to Add New button Click to Upload Plugin Choose plugin.zip (you can find it inside the ZIP which you downloaded from CodeCanyon) and upload After uploaded activate the plugin
docs.title: Install Downloader

docs.text: Open your WordPress Plugins page Click to Add New button Type Polylang to search field Click to Install Now then Activate Open setup dialog Choose and add languages which you want to use in your website Click to Continue and finish the setup
docs.title: Install Polylang

docs.text: Open your website on browser. You will see regular Wordpress installer. Enter database credentials which you have created at the first step of this guide then click submit button. Run the installer and create a Wordpress administrator user for manage your website. After completing the Wordpress installation you can login now your wordpress admin dashboard at http://yourwebsite.com/wp-admin You can find detailed Wordpress installation guide here.
docs.title: Install Wordpress

docs.text: System Requirements Server Requirements PHP 7.0 or higher cURL mbstring must be installed allow_url_fopen must enabled File Permissions These folders must be writeable. You should set CHMOD value to 755. /wp-content/plugins/aio-video-downloader/cache /wp-content/plugins/aio-video-downloader/cookies
docs.title: System Requirements

docs.text: PHP 7.0 or higher cURL mbstring must be installed allow_url_fopen must enabled
docs.title: Server Requirements

docs.text: These folders must be writeable. You should set CHMOD value to 755. /wp-content/plugins/aio-video-downloader/cache /wp-content/plugins/aio-video-downloader/cookies
docs.title: File Permissions

docs.text: Delete old plugin and theme on WordPress dashboard Upload and activate new plugin and theme (or you can upload new files by FTP)
docs.title: Upgrade Guide

docs.text: Download the latest version of WordPress https://wordpress.org/latest.zip Open File Manager Open public_html folder. If your website files will be in different folder you need to open that folder. Click to Upload button to open upload manager. Select and upload upload.zip . You can close the tab when green bar appeared. Get back to the previous page and click to Reload you will see upload.zip Choose upload.zip and click to Extract then extract the ZIP file to the current directory. You should delete the upload.zip after upload completed.
docs.title: Upload Files

docs.text: YouTube plugin is not installed by default. You need to download and upload it by yourself. Open https://aiovideodl.ml/yt-plugin Enter your purchase code and website URL. Download the ZIP file. Extract and upload ZIP contents ( YouTube.php and vendor folder) to /wp-content/plugins/aio-video-downloader/includes/downloaders
docs.title: Install YouTube Plugin
